scripts.package: npm run build:webcomponents && npm run build:webapp && npm run package -w webapp
scripts.prepare-test: npm run clean:hc & npm run build:webcomponents && npm run build:webapp
scripts.devtest: npm run prepare-test && npm run start:agent
scripts.devtest:electron: npm run prepare-test && DEV_MODE='dev' npm run electron -w electron
scripts.devtest:we: npm run prepare-test && npm run devtest -w we-applet
scripts.start:happ: RUST_LOG=warn echo "pass" | hc s --piped -f=$ADMIN_PORT generate submodules/snapmail.happ --run=$HC_PORT -a snapmail network mdns
scripts.start:happ-proxied: RUST_LOG=warn echo "pass" | hc s --piped -f=$ADMIN_PORT generate submodules/snapmail.happ --run=$HC_PORT -a snapmail network --bootstrap https://bootstrap-staging.holo.host/ quic -p=kitsune-proxy://SYVd4CF3BdJ4DS7KwLLgeU3_DbHoZ34Y-qroZ79DOs8/kitsune-quic/h/165.22.32.11/p/5779/--
scripts.start: npm run build:happ && npm run start:agent
scripts.start:agent: DEV_MODE='dev' HC_PORT=$(port) ADMIN_PORT=$(port) concurrently "npm run build:webcomponents" "npm run start:happ-proxied" "sleep 10 && npm run start -w snapmail"
scripts.network: npm run build:happ && concurrently-repeat "npm run start:agent"
scripts.dist:webhapp: npm run package -w webapp && npm run dist:webhapp -w webapp
scripts.dist:we: npm run package -w webapp && npm run package -w we-applet
scripts.dist:win: bash scripts/copy-binaries.sh && npm run dist:win -w electron
